Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
# Search for finance-related markets using the search/text approach
r = requests.get\(''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/markets'', params={''limit'': 10, ''active'': ''true'', ''tag'': ''economics''}\)
print\(''tag=economics:'', len\(r.json\(\)\)\)
for m in r.json\(\)[:3]:
    print\('' '', m.get\(''question'',''''\)[:80]\)

r = requests.get\(''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/markets'', params={''limit'': 10, ''active'': ''true'', ''tag'': ''Finance''}\)
print\(''tag=Finance:'', len\(r.json\(\)\)\)
for m in r.json\(\)[:3]:
    print\('' '', m.get\(''question'',''''\)[:80]\)

# Try the events endpoint with slug
r = requests.get\(''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/events'', params={''limit'': 10, ''active'': ''true'', ''tag'': ''economics''}\)
print\(''events tag=economics:'', len\(r.json\(\)\)\)
for e in r.json\(\)[:3]:
    print\('' '', e.get\(''title'',''''\)[:80], ''|'', e.get\(''slug'',''''\)[:40]\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(r''c:\\Users\\sambo\\Downloads\\Polymarket Arb\\prediction_markets.db''\)
c = conn.cursor\(\)
# Check volume values in markets table
rows = c.execute\(''SELECT volume FROM markets WHERE volume > 0 ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 10''\).fetchall\(\)
print\(''Top 10 volumes:'', [r[0] for r in rows]\)
rows = c.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM markets WHERE volume >= 10000''\).fetchone\(\)
print\(''Markets with vol >= 10k:'', rows[0]\)
rows = c.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM markets WHERE volume > 0''\).fetchone\(\)
print\(''Markets with vol > 0:'', rows[0]\)
rows = c.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM markets WHERE volume = 0 OR volume IS NULL''\).fetchone\(\)
print\(''Markets with vol = 0/NULL:'', rows[0]\)

# Check what the detected movements have for volume
print\(\)
print\(''=== Detected movements joined with market volume ===''\)
for r in c.execute\(''''''
    SELECT d.question, m.volume, d.movement_type
    FROM detected_movements d
    LEFT JOIN markets m ON d.market_id = m.market_id
    ORDER BY m.volume ASC
    LIMIT 10
''''''\).fetchall\(\):
    print\(f''  vol={r[1]:,.0f} | {r[2]} | {r[0][:60]}''\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
from polymarket_monitor import PolymarketMonitor
from movement_analyzer import MovementAnalyzer

monitor = PolymarketMonitor\(\)
print\(''Polling Polymarket API...''\)
monitor.poll_once\(\)
print\(''Done polling.''\)

analyzer = MovementAnalyzer\(\)
print\(''Taking snapshot...''\)
count = analyzer.take_snapshot\(\)
print\(f''Snapshot taken for {count} markets''\)

print\(\)
print\(''Querying a sample detected movement...''\)
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''prediction_markets.db''\)
conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
row = conn.execute\(''SELECT * FROM detected_movements ORDER BY detected_at DESC LIMIT 1''\).fetchone\(\)
if row:
    d = dict\(row\)
    for k, v in d.items\(\):
        print\(f''  {k}: {v}''\)
else:
    print\(''No movements found yet.''\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''prediction_markets.db''\)
conn.row_factory = sqlite3.Row
rows = conn.execute\(''SELECT * FROM detected_movements ORDER BY severity, abs\(price_change_pct\) DESC LIMIT 5''\).fetchall\(\)
for i, r in enumerate\(rows, 1\):
    d = dict\(r\)
    print\(f''--- Movement {i} ---''\)
    for k, v in d.items\(\):
        print\(f''  {k}: {v}''\)
    print\(\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
from polymarket_monitor import PolymarketMonitor
from movement_analyzer import MovementAnalyzer
import sqlite3

monitor = PolymarketMonitor\(\)
print\(''Polling \(no crypto\)...''\)
monitor.poll_once\(\)

# Clear old movements
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''prediction_markets.db''\)
conn.execute\(''DELETE FROM detected_movements''\)
conn.commit\(\)
conn.close\(\)

# Snapshot and analyze
analyzer = MovementAnalyzer\(\)
analyzer.take_snapshot\(\)
analysis = analyzer.analyze_last_24_hours\(\)
print\(f''Total movements: {analysis[""total_movements""]}''\)
print\(f''  Odds swings: {analysis[""odds_swings""]}''\)
print\(f''  Capital flows: {analysis[""capital_flows""]}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''prediction_markets.db''\)

crypto_kw = [''bitcoin'',''btc'',''ethereum'',''eth'',''crypto'',''dogecoin'',''doge'',''solana'',''sol'',''ripple'',''xrp'',''cardano'',''token'',''nft'',''defi'',''blockchain'',''coinbase'',''binance'',''fdv'',''airdrop'',''memecoin'',''meme coin'',''polkadot'',''chainlink'',''avalanche'',''polygon'',''matic'',''litecoin'',''ltc'',''shiba'',''pepe'']

# Build SQL condition
conditions = '' OR ''.join\([f""LOWER\(question\) LIKE ''%{kw}%''"" for kw in crypto_kw]\)

# Delete crypto from markets table
r1 = conn.execute\(f''DELETE FROM markets WHERE {conditions}''\)
print\(f''Deleted {r1.rowcount} crypto markets''\)

# Delete crypto from market_snapshots \(need to join on market_id\)
# Get crypto market_ids first
ids = conn.execute\(f''SELECT DISTINCT market_id FROM market_snapshots ms JOIN markets m ON ms.market_id = m.market_id WHERE {conditions.replace\(""question"", ""m.question""\)}''\).fetchall\(\)

# Simpler: delete snapshots where market_id matches crypto markets in markets table
# But we already deleted from markets. Let''s check snapshots directly via question in markets
# Actually snapshots don''t have question. Let''s get market_ids of crypto from the snapshot data by joining

# Better approach: get all market_ids that are crypto from the original markets table backup
# Since we deleted them, let''s just delete snapshots for market_ids not in markets
r2 = conn.execute\(''DELETE FROM market_snapshots WHERE market_id NOT IN \(SELECT market_id FROM markets\)''\)
print\(f''Deleted {r2.rowcount} orphaned snapshots''\)

# Clear detected movements
r3 = conn.execute\(''DELETE FROM detected_movements''\)
print\(f''Cleared {r3.rowcount} old movements''\)

# Clear market_comparisons
r4 = conn.execute\(''DELETE FROM market_comparisons''\)
print\(f''Cleared {r4.rowcount} old comparisons''\)

conn.commit\(\)
conn.close\(\)
print\(''Done cleaning.''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(''prediction_markets.db''\)

# Check snapshot timestamps
rows = conn.execute\(''SELECT DISTINCT timestamp FROM market_snapshots ORDER BY timestamp''\).fetchall\(\)
print\(f''Distinct snapshot timestamps: {len\(rows\)}''\)
for r in rows:
    cnt = conn.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM market_snapshots WHERE timestamp=?'', \(r[0],\)\).fetchone\(\)[0]
    print\(f''  {r[0]}: {cnt} markets''\)

# Check if any crypto still in snapshots
crypto_kw = [''bitcoin'',''btc'',''ethereum'',''eth'',''crypto'',''dogecoin'',''doge'',''solana'',''sol'',''xrp'']
# snapshots don''t have question column, need to join
crypto_snap = conn.execute\(''''''
    SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM market_snapshots s 
    JOIN markets m ON s.market_id = m.market_id 
    WHERE '''''' + '' OR ''.join\([f""LOWER\(m.question\) LIKE ''%{kw}%''"" for kw in crypto_kw]\)\).fetchone\(\)[0]
print\(f''Crypto snapshots remaining: {crypto_snap}''\)
conn.close\(\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
from movement_analyzer import MovementAnalyzer
analyzer = MovementAnalyzer\(db_path=''prediction_markets.db''\)
for vol in [100000, 75000, 50000, 40000, 35000, 30000, 25000, 20000]:
    analyzer.min_market_volume = vol
    swings = analyzer.detect_odds_swings\(lookback_hours=72\)
    flows = analyzer.detect_capital_flows\(lookback_hours=72\)
    seen = set\(\)
    unique = []
    for m in swings + flows:
        if m.question not in seen:
            seen.add\(m.question\)
            unique.append\(m\)
    print\(f''Volume >= {vol}: {len\(unique\)} unique movements''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
from movement_analyzer import MovementAnalyzer
analyzer = MovementAnalyzer\(db_path=''prediction_markets.db''\)
for vol in [500000, 400000, 300000, 250000, 200000, 175000, 150000]:
    analyzer.min_market_volume = vol
    swings = analyzer.detect_odds_swings\(lookback_hours=72\)
    flows = analyzer.detect_capital_flows\(lookback_hours=72\)
    seen = set\(\)
    unique = []
    for m in swings + flows:
        if m.question not in seen:
            seen.add\(m.question\)
            unique.append\(m\)
    print\(f''Volume >= {vol}: {len\(unique\)} unique movements''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect\(r''c:\\Users\\sambo\\Downloads\\Polymarket Arb\\prediction_markets.db''\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)
cursor.execute\(''SELECT question, description FROM markets WHERE question LIKE ""%Tariff%"" LIMIT 1''\)
row = cursor.fetchone\(\)
q = row[0]
d = row[1]
print\(f''Question: {repr\(q\)}''\)
print\(f''Description: {repr\(d[:100]\)}''\)

# Check the text that is_finance_market would see
text = \(q + '' '' + \(d or ''''\)\).lower\(\)
print\(f''Combined text: {repr\(text[:100]\)}''\)

# Check for tariff
print\(f''tariff in text: {""tariff"" in text}''\)
")

Bash("C:\\Users\\sambo\\AppData\\Local\\Python\\bin\\python.exe" -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, r''c:\\Users\\sambo\\Downloads\\Polymarket Arb''\)
from polymarket_scanner import ScannerConfig, PolymarketClient

config = ScannerConfig\(\)
client = PolymarketClient\(config\)

# Replicate exactly what get_markets_from_db returns
market = {
    ''id'': ''123'',
    ''question'': ''Will all of Trumps Greenland Tariffs go into effect by Feb 1?'',
    ''description'': ''On January 17, Donald Trump threatened to impose new tariffs on Denmark'',
    ''category'': ''uncategorized'',
    ''volume'': 100000,
    ''liquidity'': 10000,
}

text = \(market.get\(''question'', ''''\) + '' '' + market.get\(''description'', ''''\)\).lower\(\)
print\(f''Text: {text[:80]}...''\)

# Check crypto
crypto_match = any\(kw in text for kw in config.CRYPTO_EXCLUDE_KEYWORDS\)
print\(f''Crypto match: {crypto_match}''\)
if crypto_match:
    for kw in config.CRYPTO_EXCLUDE_KEYWORDS:
        if kw in text:
            print\(f''  -> {kw}''\)

# Check finance
finance_match = any\(kw in text for kw in config.FINANCE_KEYWORDS\)
print\(f''Finance match: {finance_match}''\)

result = client.is_finance_market\(market\)
print\(f''Final result: {result}''\)
")
